org.agreement_technologies.service.map_planner

Class POP

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.agreement_technologies.service.map_planner.Planner
      • org.agreement_technologies.service.map_planner.POP
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ExtendedPlanner, Planner

    public class POP
extends Planner
    Partial-Order Planner main class. Parameters: configuration object, search tree, timeout, solution checking method, auxiliar array, base plan, incremental version of the base plan
    Since:
    1.0
